metadata.description: Build profitable skills and services for the OpenClaw ecosystem. 6 plugins covering skill development, API integration, security, automation, deployment, and monetization. From zero to ClawHub in 30 minutes.

plugins.name: skill-builder
plugins.description: Build high-quality ClawHub skills that solve real problems. Follows the SKILL.md spec, includes testing workflows, and guides you from idea to published skill in under 30 minutes.

plugins.name: api-integration
plugins.description: Connect OpenClaw to any API. Pattern library for REST, GraphQL, webhooks, and authentication flows. Turn API documentation into working skills with security best practices built in.

plugins.name: security-guard
plugins.description: Protect users and build trust. Audit skills for security vulnerabilities, implement safe credential handling, sandbox untrusted code, and navigate the post-ClawHavoc security landscape.

plugins.name: automation-factory
plugins.description: Build and sell profitable automations. Templates for SMB workflows, pricing strategies, packaging multi-skill solutions, and turning one-off automations into recurring revenue.

plugins.name: setup-services
plugins.description: Deploy OpenClaw installations professionally. Checklists for Docker configuration, messaging platform integration, security hardening, and troubleshooting. Turn setup complexity into service revenue.

plugins.name: monetization-toolkit
plugins.description: Every revenue model for ClawHub developers. Freemium skill strategies, marketplace positioning, pricing psychology, and distribution channels. Make money while you sleep.
